sentence.Network_en: His eyes rested on her doubtfully.
She doubtfully led him the way to the hallroom - nursery.
sentence.Network_cn: 她迟疑不决地把他领到楼上婴儿室去.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... doubtful 可疑的 doubtfully 怀疑地 doubtless 无疑的.
共 177 期连播1.doubtfully adv. 怀疑地, 含糊地例句：

list.abs: I doubtfully cock my head to one side ., 我疑惑地把头歪向一边.

entry.def: If it is doubtful that something will happen, it seems unlikely to happen or you are uncertain whether it will happen.

example.ex: For a time it seemed doubtful that he would move at all...
example.tran: 有一段时间他似乎根本不会搬家。

example.ex: It is doubtful whether Tweed, even with his fluent French, passed for one of the locals...
example.tran: 尽管特威德能说一口流利的法语，他是否能被当作当地人还很难说。

entry.tran: 怀疑的;疑惑的;拿不定主意的
entry.def: If you are doubtful about something, you feel unsure or uncertain about it.

example.ex: I was still very doubtful about the chances for success...
example.tran: 我对能否成功仍然深表怀疑。

example.ex: Why did he sound so doubtful?
example.tran: 为什么他听上去如此不确定？

entry.def: If you say that something is of doubtful quality or value, you mean that it is of low quality or value.

example.ex: ...selling something that is overpriced or of doubtful quality...
example.tran: 售卖漫天要价或质量低劣的东西

example.ex: They also seemed of very doubtful value.
example.tran: 它们好像也没有多大价值。

entry.tran: (通常指运动员因伤)不大可能参加（比赛）的
entry.def: If a sports player is doubtful for a match or event, he or she seems unlikely to play, usually because of injury.

example.ex: Forsyth is doubtful for tonight's game with a badly bruised leg.
example.tran: 福赛斯腿部严重擦伤，不大可能参加今晚的比赛。

auth_sentence.content: My companion chose it and enjoyed it, but eyed the polenta doubtfully.
auth_sentence.res_content: My companion chose it and enjoyed it, but eyed the polenta doubtfully.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: My companion chose it and enjoyed it, but eyed the polenta doubtfully.

auth_sentence.content: "Maybe the dad will take care of them," Charlie says, doubtfully.
auth_sentence.res_content: "Maybe the dad will take care of them," Charlie says, doubtfully.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Maybe the dad will take care of them," Charlie says, doubtfully.

sentences.en: His eyes rested on her doubtfully.
